comments: The good thing is he only tests on things he goes over in class and you don\'t really need the book to pass. The bad news is, you have to do good on the quizzes because there isn\'t any homework or papers. So if you follow along in class and study before the quizzes (which he always tells you about) you should be good. He\'s an easy going guy.

Idk why anyone wouldn\'t, he keeps it educational n fun.

comments: Excellent teacher. Made his class interesting & fun. The only thing that made it difficult was no partial credit. Other than that if you show up he pretty much gives you tests and quizzes beforehand. He explains everything in full detail until everyone in the class understands, so if you have questions definitely don\'t be afraid to ask.

comments: This class requires your attendance and your complete focus. Professor Mills cover several philosphers over the course of the semester. He is a very good teacher and has a way of making philosphy interesting. You are required to complete essays each week and it counts as 80% of your grade, so do the essays and you will pass the class.
